cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses reinforcement learning algorithms for stochastic games, which are commonly studied in the fields of machine learning (cs.LG) and game theory (cs.GT). The focus on coordination and learning to achieve the highest-possible value suggests that the paper may also fall under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and multi-agent systems (cs.MA). Finally, the mention of convergence rates and guaranteed convergence suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the field of control systems (cs.SY).
